title: Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal. Prepare yourself in every way you can ...
content: 31  /  18   Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal. Prepare yourself in every way you can by increasing your knowledge and adding to your experience, so that you can make the most of opportunity when it occurs.	by Mario Andretti Found in Circumstances Quotes, Inspirational Quotes, Miscellaneous Quotes, Share to:
contentWithMarkup: Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal. Prepare yourself in every way you can by increasing your knowledge and adding to your experience, so that you can make the most of opportunity when it occurs.
